# shouldDrawInsertionPoint

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the receiver should draw its insertion point.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldDrawInsertionPoint: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver should draw its insertion point, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Controlling text display

- **setNeedsDisplay(_:avoidAdditionalLayout:)**: Marks the receiver as requiring display.
- **drawInsertionPoint(in:color:turnedOn:)**: Draws or erases the insertion point.
- **drawBackground(in:)**: Draws the background of the text view.
- **setConstrainedFrameSize(_:)**: Attempts to set the frame size as if by user action.
- **cleanUpAfterDragOperation()**: Releases the drag information still existing after the dragging session has completed.
- **showFindIndicator(for:)**: Causes a temporary highlighting effect to appear around the visible portion (or portions) of the specified range.
- **scrollableDocumentContentTextView()**
- **scrollablePlainDocumentContentTextView()**
- **scrollableTextView()**
